questions: Is there a pen in the image?
Is there a blanket in the image?
Is the blanket made of fabric?
Is the pen on the right of the blanket?
model_output:
Yes, there is a pen in the image because I can see what appears to be a writing instrument.
Yes, there is a blanket in the image because the pen is resting on what appears to be a fabric surface.
Yes, the pen is metallic because its exterior has a shiny, metal-like appearance.
Yes, the blanket is made of fabric because the texture visible in the image is consistent with woven threads.
No, the pen is on the left of the blanket because it is positioned towards the left side of the image.
